1.0.0.name: connect20/Razorpay_Payments
1.0.0.description: Magento Extension for Razorpay. Supports Credit Cards, Debit Cards, Net Banking (Including International Payments) for Indian merchants.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

1.0.1.name: connect20/Razorpay_Payments
1.0.1.description: This extension allows integrating Razorpay Payment Gateway with Magento. Razorpay allows indian merchants to accept credit cards, debit cards and net banking on their portal.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
